rpc.querygen
Class PathTranslator

java.lang.Object
  rpc.querygen.PathTranslator

public class PathTranslator
extends java.lang.Object

PathTranslator provides a SQL query for a given path and aggregator.

Constructor Summary
PathTranslator(Path path, Aggregator agg, java.lang.String newVarName)
          Initializes a PathTranslator object and necessary SQL mappings for names along the path if the same table used multiple times.
 
Method Summary
 java.lang.String getBaseItem()
          Gets the base table name of the path and query.
 java.lang.String getNewVarName()
          Get the name used to rename the variable in the query.
 java.lang.String getQuery()
          Builds the SQL query for the path.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

PathTranslator

public PathTranslator(Path path,
                      Aggregator agg,
                      java.lang.String newVarName)
Initializes a PathTranslator object and necessary SQL mappings for names along the path if the same table used multiple times.

Parameters:
path - the path to translate.
agg - the aggregator over the path.
newVarName - the name to use to rename the variable in the query.
Method Detail

getBaseItem

public java.lang.String getBaseItem()
Gets the base table name of the path and query.

Returns:
the name of the base table.

getNewVarName

public java.lang.String getNewVarName()
Get the name used to rename the variable in the query.

Returns:
the new name for the variable in the query.

getQuery

public java.lang.String getQuery()
Builds the SQL query for the path.

Returns:
the SQL query.
